post_title: Four PSA Graded T206 Jake Thielman-Listed Individually
post_content: If this doesn’t sell as a lot after a week or so, I’ll price them individually. I’d like $375 for the group. DM with any questions. I might be slow to answer because I’ll be traveling for the better part of the next three days, but I’ll try to get back as quickly as possible.
I'm settled in now. I lowered the price slightly to $375 delivered
Lowering the price once more, then will go to individual sales if it doesn't sell after a week. Looking for $349 for the lot delivered. Has some breakup value at that price

Full lot price is still $349, but here are individual prices for the cards. Paypal please, delivery is included:

PSA 1.5 $70
PSA 2 Polar Bear $SOLD
PSA 2.5 $100
PSA 3.5 $135

Polar Bear card is sold. Other three are available still.

shipping included in the prices

It's been a little bit since I bumped this post. Prices on the three remaining and the photo is in the last post. If anyone wants all three, I'll do $250 delivered (that's $30 off of the individual prices)
